titleStmt.title: An apology for the army, touching the eight quære's upon the late declarations and letters from the army, touching sedition falsly charged upon them. Wherein those quæres are resolved, and thereby the present proceedings of the army are proved to be legall, just & honorable. By David Jenkins, prisoner in the Tower of London.
titleStmt.author: Jenkins, David, 1582-1663.

notesStmt.note: A reply to: Prynne, William. VIII queries upon the late declarations of, and letters from, the army (Wing P3949).
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
